channel.title: 508 server help
channel.description:
I began learning java yesterday ^_^ so dont take this the hard way when i am gonna ask how to run a 508 server. I keep getting the same message when i attempt to run.cmd :P
it cant find the specified path...it should be in the right spot but i could be wrong, after all the server is fully compiled now, im just curious why it isnt working

item.title: 508 server help
item.dc:creator: @trivenge trivenge
item.description:
@trivenge wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:2, topic:234475”][quote author=trivenge link=topic=309146.msg2470464#msg2470464 date=1222969552]
I began learning java yesterday so dont take this the hard way when i am gonna ask how to run a 508 server. I keep getting the same message when i attempt to run.cmd

it cant find the specified path…it should be in the right spot but i could be wrong, after all the server is fully compiled now, im just curious why it isnt working
[/quote]
have you got the latest java and updated it in your classpath and path? and also when you do that it would help to restart your computer also… make sure theres a correct code in ‘run’ always click edit before clicking ‘run’ for further infomation go to tutorial section and how to make a server and go to the class path and path part i hope this helped ;)[/quote]

yes, im not sure if i have the latest jdk but im pretty sure i do, i used environment variables from different websites so im not entirely sure they are correct. When i comes to run.cmd, im sure it is right. might need to run me over the classpath and path to be sure though[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 02, 2008, 03:40:34 pm[/size][hr][quote=“trivenge”][quote author=TOMSCAPE BETA link=topic=309146.msg2470475#msg2470475 date=1222970115]

I began learning java yesterday so dont take this the hard way when i am gonna ask how to run a 508 server. I keep getting the same message when i attempt to run.cmd

it cant find the specified path…it should be in the right spot but i could be wrong, after all the server is fully compiled now, im just curious why it isnt working

have you got the latest java and updated it in your classpath and path? and also when you do that it would help to restart your computer also… make sure theres a correct code in ‘run’ always click edit before clicking ‘run’ for further infomation go to tutorial section and how to make a server and go to the class path and path part i hope this helped
[/quote]

yes, im not sure if i have the latest jdk but im pretty sure i do, i used environment variables from different websites so im not entirely sure they are correct. When i comes to run.cmd, im sure it is right. might need to run me over the classpath and path to be sure though[/quote][br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 02, 2008, 04:04:43 pm[/size][hr]bump

Read full topic

item.title: 508 server help
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“trivenge, post:1, topic:234475”]I began learning java yesterday so dont take this the hard way when i am gonna ask how to run a 508 server. I keep getting the same message when i attempt to run.cmd

it cant find the specified path…it should be in the right spot but i could be wrong, after all the server is fully compiled now, im just curious why it isnt working[/quote]
have you got the latest java and updated it in your classpath and path? and also when you do that it would help to restart your computer also… make sure theres a correct code in ‘run’ always click edit before clicking ‘run’ for further infomation go to tutorial section and how to make a server and go to the class path and path part i hope this helped

Read full topic
